General.Name: Shandong Hongyu Agricultural Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Hongyu Agricultural Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of agricultural machinery parts and components in China. The company offers agricultural tractor lifters, large and medium horsepower lifters and their accessories, chassis and gearbox, and tractor hydraulic lifters. It also offers hydraulic cylinder, such as single and double acting cylinder; control valves; and casting products. In addition, the company is involved in manufacture and sales of hydraulic systems for general machinery and vehicles; house leasing; and import and export business. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Laizhou, China.
